title: Time of Heroes
alt: The World Map of Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes

content.html: The backer code for Eiyuden Chronicle arrived last night. Not even an hour in, the music in the first town was so pretty it made me tear up a little—in part thinking of Murayama’s fate, but also remembering how happy and excited the Kickstarter announcement made me in the middle of a now-distant 2020.
